T02D3721:10a-1: gu ru panytsa bim shi ka / bod skad du /
T02D3721:10a-3: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3721:10a-4: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas thob rgyur gyur pa //
T02D3721:10a-5: bla ma'i zhabs kyi padmar ji bzhin btud byas te //
T02D3721:10a-6: de bstan pa ni dri med rgyud mang las gsungs pa //
T02D3721:10a-7: mdor bsdus bshad pa 'di ni gus pas mnyan par gyis //
T02D3721:10a-8: dbang bskur mchog thob rdo rje yi //
T02D3721:10a-9: slob dpon la ni de bzhin gshegs //
T02D3721:10a-10: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pas //
T02D3721:10a-11: dus gsum du ni mngon phyag 'tshal //
T02D3721:10a-12: mchog tu dad pas dus gsum du //
T02D3721:10a-13: dkyil 'khor me tog bcas thal mos //
T02D3721:10a-14: ston pa bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing //
T02D3721:10a-15: zhabs la spyi bos phyag bya'o //
T02D3721:10a-16: khyim pa'am ni gsar bu la //
T02D3721:10a-17: 'jig rten smod pa spang pa'i phyir //
T02D3721:10a-18: dam chos la sogs mdun bdar te //
T02D3721:10a-19: brtul zhugs 'dzin pas blos phyag bya //
T02D3721:10a-20: gdan bstabs pa dang ldang ba dang //
T02D3721:10a-21: don gyi bya ba sogs bsnyen bkur //
T02D3721:10a-22: brtul zhugs can gyis kun bya ste //
T02D3721:10a-23: phyag bya dam pa min las spang //
T02D3721:10a-24: bla ma dang ni slob ma dag / mtshungs par dam tshig nyams 'gyur bas //
T02D3721:10a-25: dpa' bos dang por slob dpon dang //
T02D3721:10a-26: slob ma'i 'brel pa brtag par bya //
T02D3721:10a-27: blo ldan slob mas bla mar ni //
T02D3721:10a-28: snying rje med cing khro la gdug / khengs shing chags la ma bsdams dang //
T02D3721:10a-29: spyo mas dang bcas par mi bya'o //
T02D3721:10a-30: brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan //
T02D3721:10a-31: bzod ldan drang la g-yo sgyu med //
T02D3721:10a-32: sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes //
T02D3721:10a-33: snying brtser ldan zhing bstan bcos mkhas //
T02D3721:10a-34: de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes //
T02D3721:10a-36: sngags bshad pa yi sbyor ba shes //
T02D3721:10a-37: rab tu zhi zhing dbang po dul //
T02D3721:10b-0: de 'dra'i mgon la bsams byas @10b nas ;
T02D3721:10b-1: / slob mar gyur nas brnyas na ni //
T02D3721:10b-2: sangs rgyas thams cad brnyas pas na //
T02D3721:10b-3: des ni rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob //
T02D3721:10b-4: slob dpon la ni smod pa de //
T02D3721:10b-5: yams dang 'tshe ba'i nad rnams dang //
T02D3721:10b-6: gdon dang rims dang dug rnams kyis //
T02D3721:10b-8: rgyal po me dang sbrul gdug dang //
T02D3721:10b-9: chu dang mkha' 'gro rkun po dang //
T02D3721:10b-10: gdon dang log 'dren rnams kyis kyang //
T02D3721:10b-11: bsad nas sems can dmyal bar 'gro //
T02D3721:10b-12: nam yang slob dpon dag gi ni //
T02D3721:10b-13: kun du sems dkrugs mi bya ste //
T02D3721:10b-14: gal te rmongs pas byas gyur na //
T02D3721:10b-16: mnar med la sogs 'jigs rung ba'i //
T02D3721:10b-17: dmyal ba bstan pa gang yin pa //
T02D3721:10b-18: slob dpon la ni smod pa rnams //
T02D3721:10b-19: der ni gnas par yang dag bshad //
T02D3721:10b-20: de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis //
T02D3721:10b-21: rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che //
T02D3721:10b-22: dge ba rab tu mi spyo mas pa //
T02D3721:10b-23: nam yang smad par mi bya'o //
T02D3721:10b-24: bla ma la ni gus bcad yon //
T02D3721:10b-25: rjes su mthun par sbyin par bya //
T02D3721:10b-26: des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams //
T02D3721:10b-28: rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni //
T02D3721:10b-29: sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang //
T02D3721:10b-30: rang srog gis kyang brten bya na //
T02D3721:10b-31: longs spyod g-yo ba smos ci dgos //
T02D3721:10b-32: gang phyir bskal pa bye ba ni //
T02D3721:10b-33: grangs med par yang rnyed dka' ba'i //
T02D3721:10b-34: sangs rgyas nyid kyang brtson ldan la //
T02D3721:10b-35: tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed //
T02D3721:10b-36: rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung //
T02D3721:10b-37: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod //
T02D3721:10b-38: rtag tu bla ma la yang 'bul //
T02D3721:10b-40: mi zad de ni 'dod pa yis //
T02D3721:10b-41: cung zad yid 'ong gang dang gang //
T02D3721:10b-42: shin tu khyad par gyur pa nyid //
T02D3721:10b-43: de dang de ni bla mar sbyin //
T02D3721:10b-44: de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la //
T02D3721:10b-45: rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02D3721:10b-46: de byin bsod nams tshogs yin te //
T02D3721:10b-47: tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D3721:10b-48: de bas slob ma snying rje gtong //
T02D3721:10b-49: tshul khrims bzod pa'i yon tan ldan //
T02D3721:10b-50: slob dpon dang ni rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D3721:10b-51: tha dad par ni mi brtag go //
T02D3721:11a-2: lham dang stan dang bzhon pa sogs //
T02D3721:11a-3: bgom mi bya ba smos ci dgos //
T02D3721:11a-4: blo gros chen po dga' sems kyis //
T02D3721:11a-5: bla ma'i bka' ni 'bad de mnyan //
T02D3721:11a-6: rigs pa yis ni mi nus pa //
T02D3721:11a-7: mi nus de la tshig gis sbyang //
T02D3721:11a-8: bla ma las ni dngos grub dang //
T02D3721:11a-9: mtho ris dang ni bde ba 'thob //
T02D3721:11a-10: de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis //
T02D3721:11a-11: bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya //
T02D3721:11a-12: bla ma'i rdzas ni srog ji bzhin //
T02D3721:11a-13: bla ma'i sdug pa'ang bla ma bzhin //
T02D3721:11a-14: de yi 'khor ni gnyen bzhin du //
T02D3721:11a-15: mnyam bar gzhag pas rtag tu bsam //
T02D3721:11a-17: gtsug tor dag dang dpyangs pa dang //
T02D3721:11a-18: stan la rkang 'jog rked par ni //
T02D3721:11a-19: lag gzhag snye bar mi bya'o //
T02D3721:11a-20: bla ma dag ni langs pa na //
T02D3721:11a-22: rtag tu de yi bya ba la //
T02D3721:11a-23: ldang mkhas phun sum tshogs par bya //
T02D3721:11a-24: mchil ma la sogs 'dor ba dang //
T02D3721:11a-25: stan la rkang 'jog rkyong ba ni //
T02D3721:11a-26: 'chag dang rtsod par smra ba dag / bla ma'i mdun du mi bya'o //
T02D3721:11a-27: yan lag mnye dang gar dag dang //
T02D3721:11a-28: glu dang rol mo mi bya zhing //
T02D3721:11a-29: gtam gyi sbyor ba mang po rnams //
T02D3721:11a-30: thos pa'i nye 'khor du mi bya //
T02D3721:11a-31: btud de stan las ldang ba dang //
T02D3721:11a-32: bus pa yis ni 'dug par bya //
T02D3721:11a-33: mtshan chu 'jigs bcas lam du ni //
T02D3721:11a-34: bsgo ba thob na mdun 'gro bya //
T02D3721:11a-35: slob dpon gyis ni mthong mdun du //
T02D3721:11a-36: blo dang ldan pas lus gcu dang //
T02D3721:11a-37: ka ba la sogs brten mi bya //
T02D3721:11a-38: sor mo'i tshigs ni drang mi bya //
T02D3721:11a-39: rkang pa bkru dang lus bkru dang //
T02D3721:11a-40: dril dang mnye ba la sogs pa //
T02D3721:11a-41: phyag ni sngon du 'gro bas bya //
T02D3721:11a-42: de bzhin mthar ni ci bder bya //
T02D3721:11a-43: de yi mtshan smos brjod na ni //
T02D3721:11a-44: ming mthar zhal sngar ldan pas bya //
T02D3721:11a-45: gzhan dag gus bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D3721:11a-46: khyad par gyi ni tshig kyang brjod //
T02D3721:11a-47: bla ma la ni bka' stsal zhu //
T02D3721:11a-48: bka' bzhin bgyid ces brjod byas la //
T02D3721:11a-49: thal mo sbyar zhing ma yengs par //
T02D3721:11a-50: bla mas bsgo ba mnyan par bya //
T02D3721:11a-51: dgod dang lud pa la sogs pa //
T02D3721:11a-52: lag pas kha ni dgab par bya //
T02D3721:11a-53: bya ba zin nas 'jam pa yi //
T02D3721:11a-54: tshig dag gis ni bzlas par bya //
T02D3721:11a-55: mdun du dul bar 'dug pa dang //
T02D3721:11b-0: @11b gos sogs tshul bzhin bsdams pa dang //
T02D3721:11b-1: pus btsugs thal mo sbyar ba yis //
T02D3721:11b-2: mnyan sogs 'dod la gsol gsum gdab //
T02D3721:11b-3: bsnyen bkur spyod ba thams cad la //
T02D3721:11b-4: yid ni nga rgyal med par bya //
T02D3721:11b-5: ngo tsha 'jigs shing bsdams pa yis //
T02D3721:11b-6: bag ma gsar pa'i tshul gnas bya //
T02D3721:11b-7: sgeg pa la sogs bya ba kun //
T02D3721:11b-8: ston pa'i mdun du spang bar bya //
T02D3721:11b-9: gzhan yang de 'dra'i bya ba ni //
T02D3721:11b-10: rang gis brtags la dor bar bya //
T02D3721:11b-11: rab gnas dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang //
T02D3721:11b-12: slob ma sdud dang 'chad pa rnams //
T02D3721:11b-13: yul der bla ma gnas pa na //
T02D3721:11b-14: rjes ma gnang bar mi bya'o //
T02D3721:11b-15: spyan 'bye sogs las ci thob pa //
T02D3721:11b-16: de kun bla ma rnams la dbul //
T02D3721:11b-17: de yis bstabs pa blangs nas ni //
T02D3721:11b-18: gzhan dag la ni ci bder bya //
T02D3721:11b-19: bla ma'i slob ma slob mar min //
T02D3721:11b-20: slob ma'ang bla ma'i mdun du min //
T02D3721:11b-21: bsnyen bkur dag dang ldang ba dang //
T02D3721:11b-22: phyag sogs byed pa bzlog par bya //
T02D3721:11b-23: slob dpon la ni gang 'bul dang //
T02D3721:11b-24: bla mas kyang ni gang stsal pa //
T02D3721:11b-25: de la btud de lag gnyis kyis //
T02D3721:11b-26: blo dang ldan pas blang bar bya //
T02D3721:11b-27: dran pa brjed med gyur pa dang //
T02D3721:11b-28: rang gi kun spyod la brtson pas //
T02D3721:11b-29: spun gyi rang spyod las 'das pa //
T02D3721:11b-30: dga' bas phan tshun bzlog par bya //
T02D3721:11b-31: na bas bla ma'i bya ba la //
T02D3721:11b-32: btud de rjes ma gnang bar yang //
T02D3721:11b-33: bkag pa rnams ni spyad byas kyang //
T02D3721:11b-34: dge sems ldan la sdig mi 'gyur //
T02D3721:11b-35: 'dir mang smra ba ci zhig dgos //
T02D3721:11b-36: bla ma dgyes byed gang yin bya //
T02D3721:11b-37: mi mnyes byed kun spang bar ni //
T02D3721:11b-38: de dang de la 'bad de spyad //
T02D3721:11b-39: dngos grub slob dpon rjes 'brang zhes //
T02D3721:11b-40: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid gsung bar //
T02D3721:11b-41: shes nas dngos po thams cad kyis //
T02D3721:11b-42: bla ma yongs su mnyes par bya //
T02D3721:11b-43: bsam pa dag pa'i slob ma ni //
T02D3721:11b-44: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song la //
T02D3721:11b-45: bla ma'i rjes su 'jug pa ni ;
T02D3721:11b-46: / kha ton bya bar sbyin par bya //
T02D3721:11b-47: de nas sngags sogs sbyin pa yis //
T02D3721:11b-48: dam chos snod du byas nas su //
T02D3721:11b-49: rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi ni //
T02D3721:11b-50: klag dang 'dzin pa nyid du bya //
T02D3721:11b-51: de ltar bla ma'i rjes 'jug slob ma ni //
T02D3721:11b-52: ma lus phan bskyed skyon med 'di byas pa'i //
T02D3721:12a-1: yas bdag gis ci bsags pa //
T02D3721:12a-2: des ni 'gro kun myur du rgyal gyur cig /
T02D3721:12a-3: bla ma lnga bcu pa slob dpon chen po rta
T02D3721:12a-4: dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D3721:12a-6: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po padm'a ka ra wa rma dang /
